title: Player Unknown's Battle Ground (PUBG)
description: PUBG Mobile is a fast-paced battle royale game where 100 players fight for survival, strategy, and victory on dynamic maps.

title: Garena Free Fire MAX
description: A popular mobile battle royale experience with fast-paced 50-player matches lasting about 10 minutes. Known for unique character abilities.

title: Minecraft
description: A seminal survival and creative sandbox game that allows players to build, craft, and explore blocky, infinite 3D worlds.

title: FIFA 25 (EA FC 25)
description: The latest installment in the world's most popular football simulation series, offering realistic gameplay and online competitive modes.

title: Ludo King
description: The mobile version of the classic board game Ludo. Play with friends, family, or online opponents in various fun-filled modes.

title: Carrom Pool
description: A simple and fun board game of Carrom with accurate physics. Challenge online players in freestyle or competitive carrom modes.

title: Genshin Impact
description: An expansive open-world action RPG set in the world of Teyvat. Features stunning visuals and deep elemental combat mechanics.

title: Call of Duty: Mobile
description: A full-fledged mobile FPS experience, combining classic multiplayer maps and modes with an intense 100-player Battle Royale mode.

title: Clash of Clans
description: Build your village, raise a clan, and compete in epic Clan Wars against millions of active players worldwide.

title: Among Us
description: A game of teamwork and betrayal in space! Crewmates work to complete tasks while Impostors secretly try to eliminate everyone.

title: Rocket League
description: Football meets driving in this award-winning physics-based sports game. Master the art of aerial strikes and goal-saving maneuvers.

title: Hades
description: A god-like roguelike dungeon crawler where you defy the god of the dead as you hack and slash your way out of the Underworld.
